text: E a yi'aali on wennjuɗo Ibraahiima e fii Jeyɗo mo On, fii Alla no Yeɗi mo laamu, nde Ibraahiima maakunoo: "Jeyɗo lam on, ko On Wuurnata Wara". [Wennjuɗo on] wi'i: "Min kadi miɗo wuurna wara". Ibraahiima maaki: "Pellet Alla no Addira naange ngen fuɗnaange, addir nge hiirnaange".Yedduɗo on mugaa. Alla fewnataa yimɓe tooñooɓe ɓen
